function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of pandemics","Impact":"Severe impact on public health, economy, and society","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust public health measures and global cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccines, advanced surveillance systems, telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, economically vulnerable","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of pandemics","Impact":"Increased anxiety, depression, and socio-economic implications","Mitigation":"Provision of mental health support, community engagement, and destigmatization initiatives","Technologies":"Teletherapy, mental health apps, community support platforms","People":"General population, individuals with pre-existing mental health conditions","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Economic impact of pandemics","Impact":"Decline in GDP, increase in unemployment, particularly affecting vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Financial support for businesses, job creation initiatives, social safety nets","Technologies":"Digital financial services, remote work platforms, job training programs","People":"Economically vulnerable populations, unemployed individuals, small business owners","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, businesses"}]}
